function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uncertainty in estimating intervention impact","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of the effectiveness of interventions","Mitigation":"Collect more data over time to reduce uncertainty","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools","People":"Researchers, policymakers, public health officials","Owner":"Researchers, policymakers, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Statistical impossibility of determining the greatest effect of interventions","Impact":"Inability to identify the most effective interventions","Mitigation":"Use advanced statistical methods to analyze intervention effects","Technologies":"Advanced statistical modeling and analysis tools","People":"Data analysts, statisticians, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, statistical organizations"},{"Description":"Inability of the model without interventions to capture recent trends in deaths","Impact":"Misunderstanding of the actual impact of interventions","Mitigation":"Refine the model to incorporate trends in deaths without interventions","Technologies":"Advanced modeling and trend analysis tools","People":"Data analysts, researchers, epidemiologists","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
